hero.title: Manage Your Inventory
hero.description: Stash is a powerful inventory management system designed to streamline your business operations, track products, and optimize your inventory levels.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your inventory efficiently

productManagement.title: Product Management
productManagement.description: Easily add, edit, and organize your products with detailed information and media.

categoryOrganization.title: Category Organization
categoryOrganization.description: Create and manage categories to keep your inventory organized and easy to navigate.

analyticsReports.title: Analytics & Reports
analyticsReports.description: Track inventory levels, monitor trends, and generate detailed reports for better decision making.

dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your inventory today.
dashboard.startAdding: Get started by adding your first product
